title: funny flex que experience.
body:
so i played a few games of flex que while solo was down.... first two games were all good

then i got matched against a former diamond toplaner  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡° )  and preceded to get abosolutely gutted.

they said in all chat that they had a diamond in their team and i knew straight away i had drawn the straw of getting him/her by the way they played by about lvl 3.

so 20 minutes in and were all getting dumpstered, then our adc loses his shit and starts the typical flaming in all chat saying things like"fuck these bronze players so bad"" i hope udyrs whole family gets cancer" and so on. the enemy team chimes in to greif twitch into salting us more by this point im just laughing my ass off at what twitch was saying. the game ends with twitch saying some nasty ass shit and then leaving, i talked in lobby for a bit and not but two minutes after leaving the lobby i get a report feedback message.

made my day.

replies.body: Yeah, i've had a few where i got near instant report feedback message, always feels good when it happens.
